metadata.title: CVE-2017-9761 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
The find_eoq function in libr/core/cmd.c in radare2 1.5.0 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based out-of-bounds read andapplication crash) via a crafted binary file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9761` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-5.0.0 - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
libradare2-common - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
radare2 - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0+dfsg-2').
